metadata.title: Dual Screen Workstation – CTA Adjustable Dual Mounting System with Monitor and Tablet Holder Mounts - for 7-13" Tablets, iPad Pro 11" & 12.9", iPad Mini, iPad Air, Surface Pro 4 (PAD-DSVT) – Silver
features: Dual mounting system along slide-positioning Bar for tablet and monitor
Holders tilt in ball sockets and rotate 360 degrees for portrait and landscape orientations
Bar rotates full 360 degrees along central pole and can be placed at any Vertical position
Sturdy weighted stand base with scratch protective pads

Compatible with 7-13 inch tablets, including the iPad 10. 2-inch (iPad 8 & 7), iPad Air Gen 4 (2020),12. 9-Inch iPad Pro (2018), 11-inch iPad Pro (2018), iPad Gen 6 (2018), iPad Gen. 5 (2017), iPad Mini, iPad Air, iPad Pro 9. 7/10. 5/12. 9, Surface Pro 4, and more; compatible with VESA compatible monitors (up to 27 inches).Best use for virtual offices, telehealth, remote work, online classes and more.Compatible devices: Surface Pro 7; Galaxy Tab S6
description: Expand the capabilities of your digital workspace with this highly adjustable dual mounting system. The simple design places your tablet and VESA compatible monitor on sliding holder mounts along a metal bar, Which can be placed at any height along the central pole. This bar can also rotate a full 360 degrees for a truly customizable dual screen experience, making this stand an excellent addition to your office, study, or classroom. The sturdy weighted stand base is outfitted with scratch protective rubber feet to prevent damage to your desk or table. The central pole is equipped with a convenient cable routing clip to keep your wires organized and out of the way. Each of the two mounts tilts in a ball socket and rotates a full 360 degrees to accommodate easy portrait and landscape orientations. Features: dual mounting system along slide-positioning bar for tablet and monitor holders tilt in ball sockets and rotate 360 degrees for portrait and landscape orientations bar rotates full 360 degrees along central pole and can be placed at any Vertical position Sturdy weighted stand base with scratch protective pads compatible with 7-13 inch tablets, including 12. 9-Inch iPad Pro (2018), 11-inch iPad Pro (2018), iPad Mini, iPad Air, iPad Pro 12. 9, Surface Pro 4, and more Compatible with VESA compatible monitors specifications: Dimensions: 20. 47 x 30. 39 x 11. 81 base Dimensions: 20. 5 x 12 tablet holder range: 8. 625 ‐ 15. 5 inches monitor weight limit: 17. 6 lbs. Monitor size limit: 27 inches Weight: 10. 18 lbs. Package contents: (1) stand base(1) central pole(1) positioning bar(1) tablet holder mounts) VESA holder mount
